reviews.review: if you want to lose your time and get rekt everytime by cheaters, then, play it hard!

CSGO has been a game I've played for way too much time for way too long and for too many countless hours. Even after writing this review I'll continue to play it, however... if you aren't 18 or above, don't play it.. don't let your kids play it... because this games built on creating an addicting atmosphere, the continual strive to be better while everyone around you is just hateful and rude and it slowly turns you into a person that is also hateful and rude. You'll put too much effort into the game, you'll miss out on doing things or playing small party games or saving money or making connections and fueling your passions in real life, if I could go back in time and never play CSGO, I would. It wasted alot of my teenage years, where I told myself that it was the only option to escape from reality, if you're young and reading this, don't get hooked on this game. If you're old, disregard this, the game preys on younger people for it's marketing, and traders within the community do the same.
